name: Recharge: Redux Demo
description: A remake of a game I made for school last year. Unlike before where I made the game from scratch using JavaScript, this time I made the game in Godot. I reused some of the assets from the original game and I made a few more as well. Don't worry these are only temporary as I plan to do a complete overhaul of the sprites and music later on. This is just a demo/prototype to see if the mechanics and gameplay work well. I hope you enjoy this game and please give me feedback, I would really appreciate it. Thank you.
